EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners (1338327228.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Dear Arvind , Some time ago you requested information regarding the services offered by MBO Partners. Now might not be the right time for you. Whatever your work life stage, I also hope you can join me in celebrating the news that independent work life in America has arrived. Our company is well into a year-long effort called The State of Independence in America <http://info.mbopartners.com/meet-the-independents.html>. I encourage you to view some very interesting findings on the size and trends for independent work in our nation. <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/who-are-the-independents.html?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCaVNctkxz%2Bf%2BRK4n0nj3PddartLEXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Are you working on a contract/project now or are you currently working W2 at the moment? Best regards,Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. Thanks again. best,Arvind From: Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCekNPvEly1O6YKKbivyzBcpen9b9yBJ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>> To: "arvind_rajoo@yahoo.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:arvind_rajoo@yahoo.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCekNPvEly1O6YKKbivyzBcpen9b9yBJ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>" <arvind_rajoo@yahoo.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:arvind_rajoo@yahoo.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCekNPvEly1O6YKKbivyzBcpen9b9yBJ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>> Sent: Monday, May 21, 2012 1:15 PM Subject: MBO Partners Dear Arvind, Thank you for the inquiry you submitted at the MBO Partners website. I wanted to introduce myself as the person at MBO Partners responsible for all new associate and partnership requests. I’ll be your main point of contact to provide you an overview of our services and answer any specific questions you may have. You may easily book a time that is convenient for you on my online schedule by go here <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCekNPvEly1O6YKKbivyzBcpen9b9yBJ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>. You can also watch a short video about who we are on You Tube <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://youtu.be/zKDzwSTmGv4?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCekNPvEly1O6YKKbivyzBcpen9b9yBJ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>. Additonally, I have a one page side by side compairson you can view by clicking here. <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Exec_vs_1099_Comparison.pdf?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCekNPvEly1O6YKKbivyzBcpen9b9yBJ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> I look forward to speaking with you and sharing more information about MBO Partners!
